key_risks: Economic sensitivity to housing market and construction activity
Labor market challenges including shortages and wage inflation
Supply chain disruptions and material cost inflation
Regulatory and legal risks including OSHA violations and labor-related lawsuits
controversies: Multiple OSHA violations and workplace safety issues
Ongoing legal cases such as Calderon v. Installed Building Products LLC and Benitez v. Installed Building Products, LLC
environmental_issues: Material cost inflation and supply chain issues for insulation and building products
governance_issues: Compliance with building codes, environmental regulations, and safety standards
Potential liabilities related to labor practices and workplace safety
